Name: Riding Shotgun
About the game: About Riding Shotgun is a micro party game where one person controls movement of the player while another person controls the shooting of the gun. Features 5 different arenas 11 different characters 5 different guns Note: In order to play 2 player, you will either need a separate PC and an internet connection or 2 controllers.
